config.neo4j.topic.cypher.mirea.public.plan: WITH event WHERE event.op = 'u' MATCH (p:Plan {id: event.before.id}) SET s.code = p.semestr = event.after.semestr, p.year = event.after.year, p.hours = event.after.hours, p.spec = event.after.spec, p.discipline_id = event.after.discipline_id WITH p, event MATCH (d:Discipline)-[r:HAS_PLAN]->(p) WHERE d.id <> event.after.discipline_id DELETE r WITH p, event MATCH (d:Discipline {id: p.discipline_id}) MERGE (d)-[:HAS_PLAN]->(p)
